description: United States Reports - the official reporter for U.S. Supreme Court decisions. Published continuously without series (e.g., volume 1 in 1790 through present). Cited as 'U.S.' and treated as the most authoritative citation for Supreme Court cases.
common_citation_mistakes: USSC (informal shorthand for U.S. Supreme Court)

description: Supreme Court Reporter - an unofficial reporter by West publishing U.S. Supreme Court opinions. Uses 'S. Ct.' abbreviation and includes decisions not yet in U.S. Reports. Parallel cites to U.S. or L. Ed. are often provided.
common_citation_mistakes: Missing period in abbreviation (S Ct instead of S. Ct.)

description: United States Supreme Court Reports, Lawyers' Edition - an unofficial reporter for Supreme Court cases, often cited in a second series (L. Ed. 2d). Abbreviated as 'L. Ed.' for first series (1882-1956) and 'L. Ed. 2d' thereafter.
common_citation_mistakes: Omitting series designation (e.g., citing L. Ed. when L. Ed. 2d is intended)

description: Lawyers' Edition, Second Series - continuation of the Lawyers' Edition reporter for U.S. Supreme Court cases. Covers 1956 to present. Often used as a parallel citation alongside U.S. and S. Ct.
common_citation_mistakes: Citing as L. Ed. without the series number when second series is intended

description: Federal Reporter - reports decisions from U.S. Courts of Appeals and other federal courts. First series (1880-1924), second series F.2d (1924-1993), third series F.3d (1993-present).
Federal Reporter, Second Series - covers U.S. Courts of Appeals decisions from 1924 to 1993.
Federal Reporter, Third Series - covers U.S. Courts of Appeals decisions from 1993 to present.
Federal Supplement - reports decisions from U.S. District Courts. First series (1932-1998), second series F. Supp. 2d (1998-2014), third series F. Supp. 3d (2014-present).
common_citation_mistakes: F Supp instead of F. Supp.

description: Federal Supplement, Second Series - covers U.S. District Court decisions from 1998 to 2014.
Federal Supplement, Third Series - covers U.S. District Court decisions from 2014 to present.
Pacific Reporter - covers state court decisions from western states. First series (1883-1931), second series P.2d (1931-2000), third series P.3d (2000-present).
Pacific Reporter, Second Series - covers western state court decisions from 1931 to 2000.
Pacific Reporter, Third Series - covers western state court decisions from 2000 to present.
North Eastern Reporter - covers northeastern state court decisions. First series (1885-1936), second series N.E.2d (1936-2003), third series N.E.3d (2003-present).
North Eastern Reporter, Second Series - covers northeastern state court decisions from 1936 to 2003.
North Eastern Reporter, Third Series - covers northeastern state court decisions from 2003 to present.
